page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The following is a list of people without whose help our school's contribution to the Domesday project would not have been possible:- The {Class of 2/1/2 and 2/1/1} {Mrs Smith Head of Humanities. {Mr Skeet, whose literary skills were {invaluable in stimulating the {imagination of his pupils. {Mr Balukewicz whose photographic {skills and willingness to overcome any {obstacles in his desire to obtain the {best photographic shot, have so {accurately portrayed our area on film. {Mr Underwood, our Project Leader who {delegated tasks and compiled the {finished results. {Miss Maddock, our Headmistress, in {this the year of her retirement, {without whose permission none of this {could have taken place. { }
